title: Xbox Series X Seen IRL - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.12.20
description:
DualShockers' Mario Rivera joins Greg to talk about Xboxes being seen in the wild, PlayStation changing the way the store works, and a whole bunch of bad news! Follow Mario: https://twitter.com/ThatMarioRivera

00:00:00 - Start
00:06:59 - Housekeeping
Kinda Funny First Impressions of Yakuza: Like a Dragon are up on youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services!
STREAMS
Second Extinction with Greg and Andy Wednesday at 12:30 p.m. PT
Ghost of Tsushima Legends with Greg and Blessing Friday at 11:30 a.m. PT
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Black Jack,Tom Bock
The Roper Report   -
00:08:45 - Xbox Series X are in the Wild!
00:13:28 - Is there a trend in gaming from previous generations that you wish to see make a comeback in next gen games? - Best Friends Q:Jordan Deeb
00:18:10 - Sony Scaling Back PlayStation Store, Hayley Williams @ GameSpot
00:22:50 - BREAKING NEWS: Rockstar Buys Crackdown 2 Developer Ruffian Games, Rebrands To Rockstar Dundee
00:26:28 - Crucible -- that game from Amazon -- Is Dead
00:35:06 - Indivisible to get no more content/updates, Logan Moore @ DualShockers
00:41:00 - Level-5 North American operations halted, RV @ GIB
00:42:25 - Final Fantasy 14 on PS5 Deets, Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:44:19 -  UPSTART 
00:45:48 -  DoorDash 
00:47:30 -  BESPOKE 
00:49:00 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:54:05 - It's an open secret in the film industry that certain movies are tailor made to grab awards. Oscar bait, I think the term is. Do you foresee an equivalent trend ever happening in the games industry? - All Aircraft Report!
00:59:10 - You‘re Wrong
01:02:30 - Squad Up: Brad(PS) - Cptkirk93
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Tim and Janet Garcia
